name: Revenge
storyline:
Experiment with true fear in Revenge, explore an "abandoned" robot factory as Chris Elbron and try to stay alive long enough to discover all its darkest secrets... if you dare...

Horrors await you in Como, Italy, inside the "abandoned" S.E.L.T. Robotics factory, here were made some experiments on robots and artificial intelligence but something went wrong and now the employees seem vanished.

Sent there by its agency, Chris Elbron, a private investigator, breaks into the facility, trying to shed light on what happened, but instead, what he finds is all but science and technology.
Once inside there's no way out but the deep dive into this hell on the earth.
summary: Revenge is a true survival horror experience that aims to show the most terrifying monster of all is the human mind.
